title: Pogačar to Skip E3, Gent-Wevelgem as Paris-Roubaix Rumors Reach Boiling Point
content:
World champion removed from start lists at E3 and Gent-Wevelgem as whispers grow louder about a tilt toward the 'Hell of the North.'

Read the full article at Pogačar to Skip E3, Gent-Wevelgem as Paris-Roubaix Rumors Reach Boiling Point on Velo.
author: ahood
